text: Ripoti za Mdhibiti na Mkaguzi Mkuu wa Hesabu za Serikali zitaendelea kuwa wazi kwa Wananchi wakati wote.
@sam_mory Lengo kuu la kutumia gharama za kila namna kukusanya taarifa za aina yoyote ile ni ili baadaye kuzifanyia kazi. Hilo ndilo lengo.
Katika kila jambo, simamia haki na timiza wajibu wako kwa umakini na nidhamu ya kiwango cha juu kabisa.
I wish you all a good weekend. I also had some of the beauties from the state visit to the Netherlands two days ago ...
... to share with you. Would you like to see it?
The Netherlands met us with two F-16s in the air, and they flew with us until they came down. This beautiful image came out. http://t.co/alptlı7y
We were the first guests of the royal palace where no formal ceremony had been held for a long time.
And the official ceremony was held in front of the palace in Dam Square. http://t.co/bu4saeoc
I controlled the ceremony. http://t.co/r9x5glyj
Two soldiers stood guard for three days, to our wreck that I put on the Memorial at Dam Square. the http://t.co/lldwo9
And there was so much interest in the square that everyone was shooting such photos in front of them.
I was always proud when I saw the palace window.
Mutual engagement was made. The engagement we gave her over the queen's neck. They also aimed at me and my wife. http://t.co/dr5wrn03
The ones that appear in the photo are Queen Beatrix. The rightmost Crown Prince Willem-Alexander,
just behind his wife Princess Maxima, Queen's sister Princess Margriet and his wife Pieter Van Vollenhoven.
I know the love of the royal family to Turkey. I have been to Turkey before on many occasions
and while we were Minister of Foreign Affairs, we went to Kayseri.
In the evening they gave a nice meal to the palace. http://t.co/rroanrek
Many of the successful Turks who lived in the Netherlands were invited to this meal. I've been very happy about them.
I made a chat with the young Dutch youths who were selected from 25 different universities together with Hayrünnisa hanım. It was so beautiful. http://t.co/ekec7mx3
On the last day of our journey we went from Amsterdam to the city of Maastricht with the entire delegation with the Royal train.
That's how the Queen welcomed us. http://t.co/gxkmjey0
We went to international flower fair together from the station. This is important to us.
Because in 2016 this fair will be held in Antalya and millions of people will come.
@mL_Eight Haki hii itaendelea kuwepo. Tuitumie vizuri.
@twalwa Well said. Thank you.!
@Owor7 Thanks. How's Gulu? Greetings!
We did the opening of the flower fair all together. http://t.co/vc4rgdrl
@cyrillsteinar Kwa pamoja. Aksante sana.!
They said they were producing this kind of hyacinth in the wake of a 20-year study. http://t.co/ailiw9s4
I gave this pudgy, both Istanbul name and life water.
@jblackvirus @GillsaInt Unaweza kuwa pia. Jitume na simamia haki na yale ya msingi, juu ya yote uwe na moyo wa kuitumikia nchi yako zaidi.!
As far as floristry is concerned, the Netherlands, which is smaller than Konya and has rarely seen the sun, is really interesting.
We have plenty of sun, water and land, which we have to consider a lot.
The Keukenhof is a very large tulip garden. It's only open for two months every year. http://t.co/lthcgstb
I also traveled there with Mrs. Hayrunnisa. Bahçenin landscaping is really nice.
The beauties in this wonderful garden reminded me of the days when I took pictures. I could not stand it and took photos for you. http://t.co/548jawzk
I also shared photos on my Facebook page (http://t.co/gwJKCXbk).
Another image from the garden ... http://t.co/L29eEP6g
This bust, which is in a small garden in Keukenhof, is the bust of the man who took the laley from Istanbul to the Netherlands 400 years ago. http://t.co/dwybbabq
As a matter of fact, the Dutch never hide that they have taken the pussy out of Turkey. The tulip is now the symbol of the Netherlands.
Anyway, together with the Emirgan, we discovered the lullaby again.
The Queen of the Netherlands, who saw great hospitality and warm interest, made us farewell again. the http://t.co/9ptd5v
As always, we had valuable members of parliament from all the parties. http://t.co/vxzbmbqt
@ arrefaee67 Welcome. Anything I can do for a young man is ready.

Come on, Caracas Socialist, come on, my Socialist Party! Let's go, then, to the great victory of October 7! A hug of a thousand arms, Comrades!
Thank you soul woman, thank you from the deepest part of my heart! How much I love you!
Elías and everyone: this morning I received the accounts with Nicolás. All approved, among others: reform law IVSS end to incorporate workers.
Comrades, you make me very happy! Let's continue fighting very hard to defeat the bourgeoisie! A flood falls on Havana and I am with you!
Today we inaugurate the Bicentennial Park of Children, with more than 20 thousand trees and that opens the Metropolitan Park to the following communes
Recoleta, Independencia, Conchalí and Huechuraba. It will be free and with 1,800 square meters of children's games and a funicular to the Zoo.

Dear friends, follow live in a few moments my live intervention of #Tulle: http://t.co/pgyxgi1g # FH2012
The French and French have massively mobilized in this presidential election, with a rare participation. #Tulle
I am at the head of the first round tonight, a position that honors me and obliges me. #Tulle
@cyrillsteinar Katika eneo gani la kiutendaji? Karibu.
The first round represents a sanction of the quinquennium that ends and a disavowal of the outgoing candidate. #Tulle
Never before had the National Front reached such a level in a presidential election. #Tulle
This is a new signal that calls for a start in the Republic. #Tulle
Tonight, I become, by the vote of the French, the candidate of all the forces who want to close a page and to open a new one. #Tulle
At the end of this first round, I am the candidate of the rally, for the change, which must be as wide as possible. #Tulle
@fahadrished Aksante sana.
I salute the candidates of the first round, Jean-Luc Mélenchon and Eva Joly. #Tulle
They called clearly and without negotiation to support me for the second round. #Tulle #Gathering
Thanks to you tonight, the change is now on and nothing will stop it. #Tulle
On May 6, I want a victory, a great victory, at the height of France, its history and its future. #Tulle
@vanessagjode Are you still in Tanzania? What are the latest updates?

I arrive at #Quimper where I meet you, Town Hall Square, at 4pm! # FH2012 http://t.co/GCjMnJwh
It was in Quimper and Lorient that I started my political career with Jacques Delors and others, we were the "new generation".
20 years later, I am at another level of responsibility, and I always have the sense of history, that of my country and mine. #Quimper
I know where I come from and I know what I owe to those who have accompanied me since leaving. #Quimper
It was in Lorient that two years ago I had made my first speech on productive recovery. # FH2012
It's only right that I come back here to #Quimper to #Lorient make a speech about the nation's recovery! # FH2012
I thank the people of Quimper for their warm welcome! #Quimper # FH2012 http://t.co/uzeUQev5
We have fulfilled the first objective: to be first in the first round! #Quimper
We will win the presidential election! #Quimper # FH2012
The wave rises, it rises so much that the candidate-outgoing will take it in the face! #Quimper # FH2012
We want the victory of the left and we want France to be able to hope for its future again! #Quimper # FH2012
I speak to everyone saying to young people, you are not so young: you are in a big country and we are going to stand up together! #Quimper
I heard the outgoing candidate say that he was going to protect the French. But who has protected, if not the forces of money? #Quimper
I'm sorry, the outgoing candidate. I move everywhere, I can go to you, it is a great happiness. It seems harder!
If I become the next President, I want to continue what I do: to be in touch with all the French. #Quimper # FH2012
Change, it must come, it happens, you hear it, it comes! #Quimper # FH2012
13 days before May 6, and I am offered 3 debates. Before the first round, it was 2! But why so many debates? #Quimper # FH2012
The debate will take place, and we will conduct it as appropriate, on the candidate's balance sheet and on our proposals. #Quimper # FH2012
Do not be afraid of anything! The only risk that the country can run is to keep the outgoing! #Quimper # FH2012
All Europeans are watching us today! #Quimper # FH2012
The next President must be that of all the French! #Quimper # FH2012
The next President must take the country! #Quimper # FH2012
I will come every 6 months to report what I have committed for the country! #Quimper # FH2012

The head of state will no longer have a special status protecting him! #Lorient # FH2012
There will no longer be multiple mandates and the proportional will be introduced to the Assembly! #Lorient # FH2012
The change will also be in the very exercise of the presidential function! #Lorient # FH2012
I say, I will be a normal President, and that will change us! #Lorient # FH2012
I want to address all the French and tell them that May 6 is a decisive moment for the country. #Lorient # FH2012
Imagine 5 more years with the same? #Lorient # FH2012
It was a Zig-zag President, without consistency, without constancy! #Lorient # FH2012
We need the country to take charge of its destiny! #Lorient # FH2012
France deserves to be respected, it is the French people who decide their future, and they alone! #Lorient # FH2012
It is in the name of European values ​​that I want to reorient the construction of the Union! #Europe #Lorient # FH2012
I want my country to recover! #Lorient # FH2012
The incumbent claims that purchasing power has increased. Maybe his ?! #Lorient # FH2012
We need to give hope to the youth! #Lorient # FH2012
The purpose of my project is to make the youth succeed! #Lorient # FH2012
